Text: This is my biggest upload yet. Let's seed the shit outta this people!
How about keeping it for downloadin?

I don't see any seeders/downloaders.
Please do the same againg as beginning, but keep on seding it. It make do some while, thanks.

I just uploaded it today, TPB doesn't update the seeders very quickly. I'm seeding off of two different computers right now and uTorrent is telling me there are 7 seeders and 54 peers so far. Pretty good start I guess.

Transmission 1.54(OSX) must not be up to latest standards or something (it's the latest I can use on a PPC). A lot of TPB torrents (incl this one) don't work at all - I get a 4xx error message returned from the tracker. Other sites' torrents always work fine...
It works like a dream (in Intel), thanks again!

I think I could kiss you if you were a woman and give you a friendly hug if you were a man.
Fantastic, I was hoping I could have my hands on this beautiful tool for a long time. Y'all got yourself another regular seeder!
Thanks again, looking forward to use it tomorra.
On OS X Lion the "Go Back" and "Continue" buttons is grayed out in the installation. Anyone know how to get pass that?

@Tigersjappa

I had the same problem but got around it by manually installing the packages, right click, "show contents" etc.  Then I reopened the installer and the continue button was appearing.  Not sure why  or how this fixed the problem but but it did.  Hope this helps.
Sorry guys I haven't tested this on OS X Lion. I use Pro Tools 8 which isn't compatible with Lion so you're on your own with that :/
Man I bet you'd have more seeders in you'd spelled "Altiverb" right lol. I found this in a round about way and got lucky...most ppl wont look that hard.
